This is a remote/hybrid position open to Utah residents only! As the Director of Business Operations, you will be responsible for identifying, evaluating, and assisting with implementing technical business solutions to improve efficiency and drive growth across the company. You will lead a team of Scrum Product Owners and Operations Specialists and be responsible for the overall management and development of these teams. You will be responsible for implementing fraud prevention solutions and processes and evaluate the need to expand the department to support fraud prevention and other strategic operational initiatives.Key Responsibilities:Identify and implement technical solutions to improve business processes and operations across all departments within AAPCManage and develop a team of Scrum Product Owners and Operations AnalystsOversee the implementation of fraud detection software, as well as Robotic Process Automation and Artificial Intelligence solutionsCollaborate with other departments to align your strategic operations segment with business goals and objectivesDevelop and maintain operational policies and proceduresMonitor and analyze key performance metrics to identify areas for improvementWork with the software development team to implement best-in-class software and technology solutions, help drive progress, and deliver business value quicklyQualifications:Bachelor's degree in a relevant field5+ years of experience in an operations or similar leadership roleStrong technical knowledge and experience with business process improvement and automationExperience with fraud detection software, Office 365, and robotic process automationExperience leading scrum product owners or product managersStrong knowledge of software development methodologies, particularly Agile, and SDLCExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsAbility to manage and motivate a team to achieve goals and objectivesWhat we offer:Competitive compensation based on experienceComprehensive benefits package including medical, dental and vision insuranceHealth Savings AccountGenerous PTO and Holiday Pay401(k) retirement planOn-Site Exercise RoomWho we are: Our mission is to advance the business of healthcare by providing professional training, industry-standard certifications, and comprehensive solutions to over 200,000 individuals and organizations across medical coding, billing, auditing, compliance, and practice management.We are humble, integrity-centered, passionate, respectful and entrepreneurial. We approach work and relationships with an abundance mentality, are trustworthy and transparent in all aspects of work, appreciate the benefits of diversity and never discriminate. We are open to new ideas, work quickly, intelligently, flexibly and dream big to find ways to accomplish the impossible.AAPC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. This company does not and will not discriminate in employment and personnel practices on the basis of race, sex, age, disability, religion, national origin or any other basis prohibited by applicable law. Hiring, transferring and promotion practices are performed without regard to the above listed items.We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.
